common.name: Name

error.min: Username must be at least 3 characters long

error.max: The email must not exceed 100 characters.

error.min: Password must be at least 8 characters long
error.lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
error.uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
error.number: Password must contain at least one number
error.special: Password must contain at least one special character

error.numeric: The phone number must contain only digits.
error.min: The phone number is too short.
error.max: The phone number is too long.

file.title: Select a file
file.description: Drag & drop or click to select a file.

common.consent: I agree to the terms and conditions

toast.token-expired: Your session has expired, please login again

meta.title: Reset Password – TassArcade
meta.description: Enter your email to receive a password reset link. The email field is prefilled if you are logged in.
meta.keywords: reset password, password recovery, forgot password, password reset email, TassArcade

meta.title: Password Reset Confirmation – TassArcade
meta.description: Confirm your password reset by clicking the link sent to your email. Securely update your password and regain access to your account.
meta.keywords: password reset confirmation, reset password, email verification, TassArcade

meta.title: Welcome to TassArcade – Your Full-Stack Starter Solution
meta.description: Get started quickly with TassArcade, a powerful full-stack starter template combining Adonis backend and Svelte frontend. Build your projects faster and smarter.
meta.keywords: Adonis starter kit, Svelte starter kit, full-stack template, web development, backend, frontend, TassArcade

meta.title: Login – TassArcade
meta.description: Log in to TassArcade using your email and password, or quickly via Google, GitHub, or Discord OAuth.
meta.keywords: login, sign in, email login, password login, OAuth login, Google login, GitHub login, Discord login, TassArcade

meta.title: Create Your Account – TassArcade
meta.description: Sign up for TassArcade by creating your account with username, email, and password. Or quickly register using Google, Discord, or GitHub.
meta.keywords: create account, sign up, register, username, email, password, OAuth, Google login, Discord login, GitHub login, TassArcade

meta.title: Edit Profile – TassArcade
meta.description: Update your username and profile picture easily on TassArcade. Manage your personal information securely.
meta.keywords: edit profile, update username, change profile picture, user settings, TassArcade

meta.title: Companies – TassArcade
meta.description: Manage your companies easily on TassArcade. Create, update, and delete companies with ease.
meta.keywords: companies, manage companies, create company, update company, delete company, TassArcade

meta.title: Create Company – TassArcade
meta.description: Easily create a new company on TassArcade. Enter your SIRET number to automatically fill in company details, then customize and save your information.
meta.keywords: create company, new company, SIRET autofill, manage company, TassArcade

popover.content: By clicking this button, this will fill the form from public official company data

error.length: The SIRET must be exactly 14 digits.
error.numeric: The SIRET must contain only digits.

error.min: The name must have at least {min} characters.
error.max: The name must not exceed {max} characters.

error.min: The address must have at least {min} characters.
error.max: The address must not exceed {max} characters.

error.min: The postal code must have at least {min} characters.
error.max: The postal code must not exceed {max} characters.
The city must not exceed {max} characters.
The address complement must not exceed {max} characters.

error.length: The country code must be exactly {length} letters.
error.uppercase: The country code must be uppercase.

meta.title: Confirm Logout – TassArcade
meta.description: Are you sure you want to log out? Confirm your logout to end your session safely on TassArcade.
meta.keywords: confirm logout, logout confirmation, end session, TassArcade

modal.title: Logout
modal.text: Are you sure you want to logout ?

unauthorized.title: Unauthorized
unauthorized.subtitle: You are not authorized to view this page.

meta.title: Unauthorized Access – TassArcade
meta.description: Your credentials do not grant access to this page. Please log in or contact support if you think this is a mistake.
meta.keywords: unauthorized access, 401 error, login required, permission denied, TassArcade

forbidden.title: Forbidden
forbidden.subtitle: You have to be logged to access this app's part.

meta.title: Access Forbidden – TassArcade
meta.description: You do not have permission to access this page. If you believe this is an error, please contact support.
meta.keywords: access forbidden, 403 error, permission denied, restricted access, TassArcade

meta.title: Page Not Found – TassArcade
meta.description: The page you are looking for does not exist. Check the URL or return to the homepage of TassArcade.
meta.keywords: 404 error, page not found, missing page, TassArcade

meta.title: Already Logged In – Return to Your Dashboard | TassArcade
meta.description: You're already logged in to TassArcade. Continue to your dashboard or return to the homepage to explore more features.
meta.keywords: already logged in, user session, dashboard, homepage, TassArcade

meta.title: Unknown Error – Something Went Wrong | TassArcade
meta.description: An unexpected error occurred while using the TassArcade. Please try again later or return to the homepage for support.
meta.keywords: unknown error, unexpected issue, error handling, troubleshooting, TassArcade

match.countPlural=zero: Are you sure you want to delete {users} ? This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove the users and all related data.
match.countPlural=one: Are you sure you want to delete {users} ? This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove the user and all related data.
match.countPlural=other: Are you sure you want to delete {users} ? This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove the users and all related data.
